hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:when any of you prays and takes off his sandals, he should not harm anyone by them. He should place them between his feet or pray with them on

chapter.ara-name: باب الْمُصَلِّي إِذَا خَلَعَ نَعْلَيْهِ أَيْنَ يَضَعُهُمَا
chapter.eng-name: If A Person Takes Off His Sandals For Prayer, Where Should He Place Them ?
